titleStmt.title: A sad and serious discourse, upon a terrible letter, sent by the ministers of the province of London, to the Lord General and his Councel of War. / By W. Ca. a member of the Army.
titleStmt.author: W. Ca.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A serious and faithfull representation of the judgments of ministers of the Gospel within the province of London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
